sources.title: A Man of Sentiment
sources.description: * Released: 1933-09-15 * Drama Romance (Eng US) * 1930s Pre-Code B&W Film * Chesterfield Motion Pictures Corporation * PRODUCER: Geo R. Batcheller * DIRECTOR: Richard Thorpe * WRITER: Frederick Hazlitt Brennan (Story); Robert Ellis (Dialogue & Screenplay) * STARRING: Marian Marsh; Owen Moore; Christian Rub; William Bakewell; Emma Dunn; Edmund Breese; Geneva Mitchell * SOURCE: 1) MrFilmschatten 2) IMDb * I own zero rights to this film, financially or otherwise and upload purely for Educational purposes, for present and future generations. Doreen (def gp ddh)

metadata.Plot: A man and woman fall in love at first sight, but everyone in their universe tries to keep them apart except one old fool with a sentimental heart.
metadata.Actors: Marian Marsh, Owen Moore, Christian Rub
